entry.title: Export format for xpub
entry.summary: In a conversation between Pavol Rusnak and an unknown individual, they discuss the h=bip32 hierarchy used for xpub/0/i and xpub/1/j chains. The individual clarifies that this hierarchy applies to BIP44 generated xpubs as well, but there are differences in requirements such as gap limit. They also discuss the creation date of the wallet which is represented by c=123456 in seconds since epoch. The individual expresses their preference for YYYYMMDD format for human readability, but Pavol argues that using seconds since epoch is simpler and consistent with Bitcoin's standard format.
